about_the_game:
The life of demons and their sidekicks is difficult.


This time, the Order of fighters against evil kidnapped a demon, whom the warrior girl Tyria vowed to protect at all costs.

Go on a journey, explore a new fantasy world, meet colorful characters, swing your sword and achieve your goals!

There is no need to save the world; it is enough to return the great master Ma-Gorr back to his refuge, simultaneously dealing with the members of the Order.

Features:


  • Stamina based combat system with sword attacks, super attacks, dodges, blocks and parries
  • Auxiliary combat magic that can be selected to suit your playstyle
  • Improving character stats through new equipment and finding secret items
  • Exploring the world according to the main story, side quests or finding secrets and better equipment
  • Side quests with gameplay that differs from the main gameplay
  • Mini-games that allow you to earn extra gold or just have fun

Devilguard is a linear adventure with an emphasis on story, exploration and combat, centered around a compelling story of loyalty, friendship and duty. In addition to the main story, Devilguard includes side quests and fun mini-games that will help you relax despite the seriousness of the main mission.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2 GHz
  • Graphics: GeForce 1050 2Gb or equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: Devilguard is a 2D action adventure game with dynamic combat, non-linear levels, exploration and an engaging story. Adventure awaits!
